prompt.0: I need an English translation for the following German text: ["Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben."]. Please provide only the translation, without additional explanations or questions. Think about this logically.

source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
The approximately 1,400 employed officials have, as of the start of the Karneval, six suspected thieves arrested and are now investigating, in addition, several cases of bodily harm and sexual crimes. The exact figures on the crimes at the Sessions start will be given in the next week.

Translation: 
The approximately 1,400 employed officials have, as of the start of the Karneval, six suspected thieves arrested and are now investigating, in addition, several cases of bodily harm and sexual crimes. The exact figures on the crimes at the Sessions start will be given in the next week.

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
